DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective trial evaluate influence consume tea catechin contain sport beverage body fat mass exercise-induced weight loss among overweight obese men woman .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Tea Catechin Sports Drink Enhancing Exercise-Induced Fat Loss
DOC.detailed_description: The study include two screening/baseline visit six treatment visit 12 week . During treatment phase study , subject instruct consume one bottle sport drink ( 500 ml ) daily ( total consumption tea catechin active group = 540 mg/d ) . Subjects ask maintain constant energy intake throughout study period . Three-day diet record collect analyzed week 0 , 6 , 12 evaluate consistency energy intake . All subject engage exercise program goal maintain 180 min/week low- moderate-intensity exercise ( e.g. , walk aerobic activity , 4-6 day per week ) . Three weekly exercise session supervise 1-3 unsupervised . Subjects ask wear pedometer record daily physical activity ( step ) night physical activity diary . Diaries collect visit use evaluate exercise compliance . Dual energy X-ray absorptiometry ( DEXA ) compute tomography ( CT ) scan perform baseline ( week 0 ) end treatment ( week 12 ) . Additionally , body weight abdominal circumference assess every clinic visit study . It anticipate subject expend 1000-1800 kcal per week baseline level deliberate physical activity . Accordingly , control group expect lose 1.5 2.8 kg body fat 12-week treatment period
DOC.criteria: Men woman 21 65 year age , inclusive Waist circumference ≥ 87 cm woman ≥ 90 cm men screen Total cholesterol ≥ 200 mg/dL Provide write informed consent authorization protect health information Volunteers Body mass index ≥ 40.0 kg/m2 < 25.0 kg/m2 ; Recent weight loss 4.5 kg ; Recent use weight loss medication , supplement , program ; History weightreducing surgery eat disorder Pregnancy
